I continue my 48 hours in the neighborhoods: after Trappes market, early this morning, I arrive at the Ulis! # FH2012
I arrive at the "House for all" Ulis for a round table with committed women neighborhood! # FH2012 http://t.co/X5YptyVw
I came to Les Ulis because a woman is mayor and the equality policy that is conducted is a reference! # FH2012 http://t.co/kSTj5cAT
We will break the glass ceiling by enforcing the rules of equal pay between men and women under penalty of sanctions. #Ulis # FH2012
I want to emphasize the extent of school drop-out: I have laid down the principle that every young person between the ages of 16 and 18 must be accompanied. #Ulis # FH2012
We will create the jobs of the future and we will set up closing doors for public markets. #Ulis # FH2012
Every time we help the parents, we help the children. #Ulis # FH2012
Sex education, provided by law, must be a real obligation. #Ulis # FH2012
We must allow women who are victims of domestic violence to stay in their homes. #Ulis # FH2012
I propose the package "minor contraception": we will give the possibility for free and anonymously to be followed by a doctor. #Ulis
A right is not only proclaimed, it must be applied: each hospital center must have an IVG center. #Ulis # FH2012
Parties that do not present as many women as men in the legislative will no longer have any endowment of the state. #Ulis # FH2012
We will create a parity government where women will have real responsibilities with important ministries. #Ulis # FH2012
We need to strengthen all integration schemes, especially for the long-term unemployed. #Ulis # FH2012
In the negotiations we will open on pensions, we will have to have a "woman" dimension in our discussions. #Ulis # FH2012
If the associations were not present and if there were no dedicated elected officials, we would have experienced new explosions. #Ulis # FH2012
I think that a single President, even supported by a majority, can not succeed alone. We must have a national effort. #Associations #Ulis
The education of fathers is indispensable: one does not become a father because one is a man. #Ulis # FH2012
Each sentence, each sanction must be executed, to avoid impunity. #Ulis # FH2012
We will strengthen the means of judicial protection of youth. #Ulis # FH2012
I thank all the women who came to talk this morning to #Ulis. You give a very beautiful image of women and your commitments
At the end of our round table with #Ulis women, I responded to the press: http://t.co/JvyKTvfR # FH2012

@SamiMahasneh did not follow his remarks but an answer to your question. My government is no longer a person or a party in anything but the integrity of the elections.

Follow live now our big gathering at #Aulnay! http://t.co/EaXM2v7g # FH2012
I come back from a journey that took me in 48 hours from Vaulx-en-Velin to #Aulnay, through Creil, Trappes, Aubervilliers ..! # FH2012
I visited these cities that are called the suburbs and which are simply France, France who wants to live with dignity! #Aulnay # FH2012
The republican promise that I address to you is to offer a dwelling worthy to each one. #Aulnay # FH2012
Every young person can have a system of joint guarantee so that the precariousness of work does not add to the precariousness of the residence #Aulnay
The price of transport will be modulated according to the income and not simply according to the distance! #Aulnay # FH2012
Youth of France, have big dreams, push the walls: no border will be asked to your own success. #Aulnay # FH2012
I want children in all parts of France to have all the conditions for fulfilling their destiny. #Aulnay # FH2012
We will create the study grant under resource conditions. #Aulnay # FH2012
We will make employment and training the priority of government action. #Aulnay # FH2012
Jeunesse de France, it's up to you to take power! #Aulnay # FH2012
I want to be the President of respect and justice! #Aulnay # FH2012
The Republic will have to uphold the principle of equality. #Aulnay # FH2012
I will make sure that each of my compatriots are respected and not suspected! #Aulnay # FH2012
I will fight not against the identity checks that are necessary but against the facies checks that are unacceptable #Aulnay
Wherever there is a hospital there will be an IVG center. #Aulnay # FH2012
It is because I am of the left that I am aware that I must win this election but also that I must afterwards change the country!
It is you the force, it is you the country, it is you the suffrage: do not let others decide your future! #Aulnay # FH2012
Be proud of who you are, in your diversity and in your unit! #Aulnay # FH2012
Be proud when the Republic is on your side! #Aulnay # FH2012
I send you this call for mass lifting, as we said during the French Revolution! #Aulnay # FH2012
Scare those who use you: you are not a threat, you are a chance for France! #Aulnay # FH2012
Do you have the will to change? So I tell you, the change is coming, it is before us! #Aulnay # FH2012

Azerbaijan is cooperating with the European Union in various fields. Our cooperation has a good history and a future. #Azerbaijan
Our cooperation plans with European institutions are of great importance to us. #Azerbaijan
In my opinion, the European Union's emblem is one of the best examples of the modern world, perhaps even the best example.
We are a country located between Europe and Asia. We have created our modern logistics and transportation infrastructure. #Azerbaijan
We are building the largest port on the coast of the Caspian Sea. After a couple of years this port will be put into operation. #Azerbaijan
At the same time, we are building highways that connect us with neighboring countries. #Azerbaijan
We are implementing a strategic project linking Azerbaijan, Georgia and Turkey with railways. #Azerbaijan
This is the only way to use our not only our conversion capabilities, but also (cont) http://t.co/7lFWme7W
As regards energy policy, it is quite clear that we are implementing our policy in this direction in accordance with our national interests. #Azerbaijan
Over the last six years, we have made a great deal of effort to ensure that the country is dependent on gas (cont) http://t.co/OuO7zI2V
It was the result of our people's efforts, on our own resources. At present, we export natural gas to neighboring countries. #Azerbaijan
By implementing important projects, we are becoming a reliable gas supplier in Europe. #Azerbaijan
At present, we are working closely with the European Union to realize the Southern Gas Corridor. #Azerbaijan
Last year, we signed a major Joint Declaration on the Southern Gas Corridor. #Azerbaijan
There, Azerbaijan is described as one of Europe's key gas suppliers and a country that stands at the forefront of the Southern Gas Corridor. #Azerbaijan

Azerbaijan is a stable, friendly and reliable partner. #Azerbaijan
The energy sector, which is part of our comprehensive cooperation with the European Union, is very important. #Azerbaijan
Our geographical location, our opportunities, our economic situation show that both economic and political, (cont) http://t.co/MGPrlNdw
We work very hard and will try to create a friendly environment with as many countries as possible. #Azerbaijan

I will compose a joint government, each member of the team will not be able to cumulate a mandate other than that of serving the country. Besancon #
We will revise our institutions to modernize and democratize them. # Besancon # FH2012
I have a duty: not to disappoint, to promise nothing that I could not hold. # Besancon # FH2012
Here in # Besançon, I have come to tell you that I am ready to preside over France, to concretely change the lives of our fellow citizens. # FH2012
You, be ready to make the choice of change on April 22! # Besancon # FH2012
Have no fear, do not be intimidated: you are the only holders of the legitimacy of the suffrage. # Besancon # FH2012
For lack of being able to promise everything again, the outgoing candidate now claims to protect! # Besancon # FH2012
The only ones that the incumbent has protected in the last 5 years are the powerful, the rentiers! # Besancon # FH2012
On Sunday, he said he felt the wave rise: I too feel it rising, the wave of anger of the people who can no longer. # Besancon # FH2012
It's the wave of change that's coming, and if you decide, nothing, nothing can stop it! # Besancon # FH2012
I will not accept any lesson from a President who has such a heavy record for the country. # Besancon # FH2012
The outgoing candidate has created 41 taxes in 5 years! # Besancon # FH2012
We will do tax reform with one goal: justice, which will tax labor and capital income in the same way.
The incumbent invents a trip to Fukushima that he has never made! # Besancon # FH2012
Today we inaugurated the second stage of the Las Higueras Hospital in Talcahuano, which allowed us to reach 400 beds and triple its space.
I do not want markets to decide for us! # Besancon # FH2012
We will separate speculative banking activities from deposit and credit activities. # Besancon # FH2012
New delivery rooms and cardiovascular and ICU units for children, which benefit the compatriots of Talcahuano, Penco, Tomé and Hualpén
I appeal to patriotism because it is the most beautiful idea that we can promote in the Republic! # Besancon # FH2012
The higher one is in the exercise of the responsibility, even more exemplary one must be in his remunerations and in his behaviors.
We must fight against all discrimination and against all inequalities. # Besancon # FH2012
We will not make new laws, we will enforce our laws. I think about equal pay for men and women. # Besancon # Equality # FH2012
I do not accept that 150,000 young people leave our school without qualification. # Besancon # FH2012
I can not admit that at the beginning of the school, already, the determinism and the fatalities make that certain young people are already "condemned".
We will create the generation contract! http://t.co/doCx8a0O # Besançon # FH2012
I am a socialist and I feel ecologist! # Besancon # FH2012
Our countries are not alone in the world, my generation is not the last, humanity is not the only inhabitant of the planet. #Ecology
Air and water are public goods! # Besancon # FH2012
I wish for a European energy community! # Besancon # FH2012
We will put in place a carbon tax on a European scale. # Besancon # FH2012
Europe as it is today has forgotten to protect the citizens, and to protect itself. # Besancon # FH2012
This election is decisive for our country, decisive for Europe: we are observed! # Besancon # FH2012
I am not a candidate against the incumbent, I am a candidate for France, for hope, for change! # Besancon # FH2012
We had said the candidate-outgoing "bling-bling", he is especially zig-zag! # Besancon # FH2012
The best event, the best strike, the best mobilization is the right to vote! # Besancon # FH2012
We have a mission: to make the left meet France to change its future! # Besancon # FH2012
It is the left that will open new paths, allow new conquests, tear new freedoms! # Besancon # FH2012
In 12 days, I ask you only one vote: the vote of victory! # Besancon # FH2012
This movement will not stop: if April 22 we are strong, May 6 we will be victorious for the Republic and for France!
